Articles.Content:
This is exciting, this is new! shouted Jeb.

Scientists stood agast, the stack finaly flew.

Proved wrong by a foolharty crew.

Ignoring the shaking and rattling, Jeb and the controls are still battling

when Bob notices - too late! The fuses blew.
You\'ve definitely got the short covered. It seems you are trying to rhyme, if so, are you going to provide more than this?
